version_description: Official worldwide global launch. Get your friends to play with you and get awesome rewards!

Get ready for some great new features!
- New Buildings and Students
- Build a new floor
- Upgrade Dorms and Classes to Lv3
- Orb Trader
- More Puzzle Stages
- “Likes” Leaderboard
- Bug fixes and general improvements

Bug fixes and general improvements
Candycane event now ongoing till mid Dec! Update now~

- New Buildings, Students, 1 Floor
- Bug fixes and general improvements

Ingots Event extended to 10 Feb!
Bug fixes and general improvements

Bug fixes and general improvements
Ingots Event extended to 10 Feb!

Get ready for some great new features!
- New Buildings, Students, Professors, Floor
- More Puzzle Stages 31 to 40! If 31-1 is not auto-unlocked, complete 30-5 again
- New Invest Quests! Now you can speed up reception and graduation queue
- Bug fixes and general improvements

Welcome to the ancient world! Unlock new wonders and discover lost artifacts!

- New Classes: Archaeology, Rune Casting, Mummify, Sand Shifting, Loom Magic, Sarcophacurse, Ancient Runes, Heal Animals
- New Facilities: Artifacts Hunt, Ice Cream Shop, Beach Chair, Enchanted Textiles, Art Club
- New Decos: Runestone, Treasure Pile, Inland Beach, Pyramid, Quicksand
- New Tiles: Archaeology Sand, Egyptian Ceramic Tile
- New Student Groups & Profs: Egyptians, Adventurers, Archaeologists, Vikings
- New Time-Limited Event Added: Fan (11 July), Fireworks (1 August)
- New Magic Event: Rainbow Gem
- New Investment: ATM
- Dorm Updates: Now you can set gender for Dorms
- Better filter options
- Bug fixes and general improvements

Welcome to the ancient world! Unlock new wonders and discover lost artifacts!

- New Classes: Archaeology, Rune Casting, Mummify, Sand Shifting, Loom Magic, Sarcophacurse, Ancient Runes, Heal Animals
- New Facilities: Artifacts Hunt, Ice Cream Shop, Beach Chair, Enchanted Textiles, Art Club
- New Decos: Runestone, Treasure Pile, Inland Beach, Pyramid, Quicksand
- New Tiles: Archaeology Sand, Egyptian Ceramic Tile
- New Student Groups & Profs: Egyptians, Adventurers, Archaeologists, Vikings
- New Time-Limited Event Added: Fan (11 July), Fireworks (1 August)
- New Magic Event: Rainbow Gem
- New Investment: ATM
- Dorm Updates: Now you can set gender for Dorms
- Avatar: Select shopkeepers as your avatar
- Better filter options
- Bug fixes and general improvements

Dine with the gods and goddesses of the Greek Roman mythologies!
- New Classes: Supernatural, Love Me Do, Amulet, Dreamcatcher, Pegasus
- New Facilities: Colosseum, Roman Springs, Fortune Teller, Greco Roman Garden
- New Decos: Maison Carrée, Santorini, Roman Statue
- New Tiles: Roman Tile (Bricks), Roman Tile (Mosaic), Greek Tile
- New Student Groups & Profs: Greek Royalty, Wanderers, Philosophers, Gladiators, Merman, Pixies
- Bug fixes and general improvements

See you in the Fantasy realm!
- New Classes: Orc Lore, Dwarven Puzzle, Ring Enchanting
- New Facilities: Magic Hammer, Elk Feeding, Hotdog Shop, Isabelle's Tour
- New Decos: Wandering Minstrel, Dweller's Home, Glistening Tower
- New Tiles: Rocky Path, Elvish Tile, Rune Tile
- New Student Groups & Profs: Orcs, Sunelves, Dwarves
- Bug fixes and general improvements
